Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
14.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
20.12.2005 SH SCR9859 BXA024A Moved HUSR_EMAIL below "Email:"
05.11.2005 SH SCR9426 Extended the width of output form from 80 to 85 to get
space for HUSR_EMAIL which had to be extended from 25 to 30 characters
30.07.2004 SH SCR6633 BXA024A Changed contents of header informations
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
04.07.2003 RR SCR3944 Added Handler to ignore record-locking
11.04.2003 SH Fixed problems with page skip if more than one page will be
- used to print the detail rows (BXA024C)
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
-- 05.02.2003 SH SCR2809 Journalnumber printed without leading blanks to XML

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT count(*) FROM :1 WHERE TB24_ID = :2 FOR FETCH ONLY
